author_desc: Computer music, and talking too much in equal measure.
text:
At Edinburgh uni, where I did my masters, there was an edit suite with 8 loudspeakers arranged along the length of the room, and a mixing desk. And I set up a mic and performed with the sound of the room and the distances to the speakers resonating.

Because of Alvin Lucier.

text:
RIP Alvin Lucier‚Ä¶
I met him a few years ago at the Robert Ashley Symposium at Wesleyan. This badass sat right up front, with his cane & sporting a Black Lives Matter hoodie. He is considered a master in the experimental music field and will forever be remembered as a champion.
